Title: Relates to authorizing a longer period for early voting and designating early voting polling places for a lesser increment of registered voters
Summary: Authorizes early voting to be available for forty-nine days before an election and designates at least one early voting polling place for every full increment of twenty-five thousand registered voters.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to authorizing a longer period for early voting and designating early voting polling places for a lesser increment of registered voters
